question: I do lot of day dreaming please show me how to get rid of it and also show me some ayats by reading of it i could become courageous and strong
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Since day dreaming is brought on by Shaytaan to distract one from the%0D%0Aremembrance of Allah Ta'ala, so whenever one realises that he has been day%0D%0Adreaming, he should recite 'Ta'awwuz' (Aoodhu billaah'.%0D%0A%0D%0AYou should also endervour to inculcate within yourself the quality of Dhikr%0D%0A(to be constantly in the remembrance of Allah Ta'ala). Dhikr polishes and%0D%0Abrings an awareness into the heart. Begin with the 3 Masnoon Tasbeehaats to%0D%0Abe recited morning and evening, viz. 100 times third Kalimah, 100 times%0D%0AIstighfaar and 100 times Durood Shareef. Try also to learn some of the%0D%0AMasnoon Du'aas, e.g. before and after eating, drinking, etc. and recite them%0D%0Aat their appropriate times. Insha Allah, with punctuality, within a brief%0D%0Aperiod, you will notice a marked difference.%0D%0A%0D%0AHereunder are a few Du'aas you may recite whenever you wish:%0D%0A1. Allaahumma inniy A'oodhu bika minal hamm wal hazan wal ajzi wal kasli wal%0D%0Abukhl wal jubn wa dalaaid dayn wa ghalaabatir rijaal. (Hisnul Haseen pg.449;%0D%0ADarul Ishaat)%0D%0A2. Wa a'oddhu bika minal qaswati wal ghaflat wal 'aylat wadh dhillat wal%0D%0Amaskanah (Ibid)%0D%0A%0D%0Aand Allah Ta'ala Knows Best%0D%0A%0D%0AMufti Ebrahim Desai%0D%0AFATWA DEPT.%0D%0A
